titles.title: A bill for the relief of Fabrimetrics, Incorporated.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From Commerce.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From Treasury.

bill.summary: 5/13/1987--Introduced. Allows a named corporation to enter or withdraw from warehouse for consumption during a limited period a specified quantity of fabrics, of strips, that are a product of the Republic of Korea and provided for in the Tariff Schedules of the United States.
